My biggest takeaway: develop and trust your instincts, and think adversarially. 

Especially when dealing with crypto wallets and random people who you meet on the internet.

And don‚Äôt ever interact with random unknown projects (or even legit / major dapps) from your cold wallet.

Ultimately, saved by a combination of luck and a few good decision:

a) I decided to move to a fresh address

b) I decided to read the contract

3) I ask her to send to my hot wallet but she sends to my primary

4) the token approval seems strange but I don‚Äôt hold it so I don‚Äôt worry 

5) she wants me to stake it in my main account. A little annoying but I‚Äôm fine with it

Thanks for sharing, glad it has a good ending.
